meta.title: NCAA DIII Great Lakes Regional Championships | Blue River Cross Country Course
meta.description: The 2024 NCAA Division III Great Lakes Regional Cross Country Championships will be held at Blue River Cross Country Course in Shelbyville, Indiana.
